# bresourcemanager

## Install

`pip install bresourcemanager`

Or use docker image

`docker pull b-scheduler/bresourcemanager`

## Usage

TBD

## Develop

Install pre-commit before commit

```
pip install pre-commit
pre-commit install
```

Install package locally

```
pip install -e .[test]
```

Run unit-test before PR

```
pytest -v
```
